definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

pinyin: ge4 ren2 fang2 hu4 zhuang1 bei4
qian2 shui3 zhuang1 bei4 tuo1 lun2 xiang1

sentences.english: Through the research, an optimization program of gas drilling equipment package is formed.
sentences.chinese: 通过研究，形成了一套气体钻井装备配套优化方案。

sentences.english: The first skid-mounted drilling rigs exported to Hungary were manufactured by RG PETRO-MACHINERY(GROUP)CO. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 第一台出口欧盟的钻机由南阳二机石油装备集团制造。

sentences.english: Your guide hand is placed above the belay device friction brake.
sentences.chinese: 您的导向手应放在绳栓摩擦制动装备上面。

sentences.english: Native troops armed with a simple bow and a crude stone axe.
sentences.chinese: 雇佣弓箭兵装备猎弓和简陋石斧。

sentences.english: The personal clothing of this soldier of the future would be lightweight with a bullet-proof jacket.
sentences.chinese: 未来士兵的服装重量将更轻，并装备防弹背心。

sentences.english: He checked off his equipment and made sure his pack was tight.
sentences.chinese: 他检查装备并且确定他的伞包已经安全。

sentences.english: Well armed and equipped Norse swordsmen. Able to wear chain and plate armour.
sentences.chinese: 北欧剑士装备极为精良，身穿链甲或板甲。

sentences.english: In this paper, the status and development of vehicle-mounted medical imaging equipments at home and broad were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了国内外车载医学影像装备的发展现状。

sentences.english: Psionicists are limited to light armor and can use daggers and two -handed staffs.
sentences.chinese: 心灵术士仅能装备轻甲并可使用匕首和双手杖。

sentences.english: Investing is the use of capital to acquire assets such as buildings and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 投资勾当与投资购建资产例如建筑物和装备相关。

sentences.english: That the man of God may be complete, fully equipped for every good work.
sentences.chinese: 叫属神的人得以完备，为着各样的善工，装备齐全。

sentences.english: Its crew consisted of themselves and a boy to assist---truly a poor equipment with which to face a great and stormy ocean like the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 这只装备简陋的小船，就要驶向太平洋的暴风雨了。

sentences.english: So, the maternity swimsuit is a fairly essential bit of kit.
sentences.chinese: 因此，孕妇泳衣绝对是必备的装备。

sentences.english: U. S. -based companies supplied a chunk of the high-tech equipment.
sentences.chinese: 美国的公司提供了大量的高科技装备。

sentences.english: The new battleship will be armed with 16-inch guns.
sentences.chinese: 那艘战舰将装备16英寸口径的大炮。

sentences.english: Is the energy and heavy chemical industry base and production base for equipment manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 是全国能源重化工基地和装备制造业生产基地。

definition: to install/to assemble/to load goods (on ships etc)
model (particular version of a manufactured article)/type (product specification in terms of color, size etc)
